txt.en: 'The job is done, then? Perhaps we guards can finally get some rest! Thank you -- I'm sure I speak for everyone here when I say that.'
You have destroyed weapons around Durshulot.\n\nRékkur in Aslíf will be glad to hear the news.
Orkish weapons can be found around Durshulot to the north-west, on the middle tier.\n\nRékkur has asked you to destroy these weapons and sabotage the Orcs' periodic skirmishes with the Gabil'akkâ.

'Every now and then, the Orcs at Durshulot will mount coordinated attacks against us. These attacks have not been overwhelming or difficult to deal with, but there must be a reason why the Orcs are holding back. I suspect the purpose of these attacks is to tire us out, make us waste our resources before the longer fight ahead.\n\n'But two can play this game. Go north-west on the middle tier to Durshulot and destroy their weapons.'
Each time the Orcs of Durshulot attack Aslíf, they erode the Gabil'akkâ's resources.
